sentence.Network_en: The big losers will be the undeveloped countries, especially sub-Saharan Africa.
sentence.Network_cn: 受害最深的将是不发达国家，尤其是非洲撒哈拉沙漠以南地区。

sentence.Network_en: Serious reform efforts can also be seen throughout south Saharan Africa.
sentence.Network_cn: 在整个撒哈拉以南非洲地区也出现了重大改革的成绩.

sentence.Network_en: This is the famous Nilometer by which water levels in the River Nilo were noted.
sentence.Network_cn: 这就是著名的尼罗河仪.用它测星尼罗河的水位.

means.word_mean: 1. a family of East African languages spoken by Nilotic peoples from the Sahara south to Kenya and Tanzania

auth_sentence.content: There are problems elsewhere for sub-Saharan migrants as well.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: There are problems elsewhere for sub-Saharan migrants as well.

auth_sentence.content: Reports circulated of tens of thousands of sub-Saharan mercenaries.
auth_sentence.res_content: Reports circulated of tens of thousands of sub-Saharan mercenaries.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Reports circulated of tens of thousands of sub-Saharan mercenaries.

auth_sentence.content: Other sub-Saharan leaders were also lukewarm to the idea.
auth_sentence.res_content: Other sub-Saharan leaders were also lukewarm to the idea.
